Tables

Tables

Display information in an easy to scan grid of rows and columns.

On this page
  • Visual design
  • Guidelines for use
  • Layouts
  • Examples and assets

Visual design

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

Applicant Organisation Project Name Project Description Project Location Amount
District Council Of Endor Endor Tourism Strategy The project will deliver a strategy for tourism in Endor, benefiting all the Ewoks. Endor moon $20,000
Great Southern Land Centre Great Southern Land Master Plan The project will deliver a Master Plan for the Great Southern Land over a ten year period. Albany $125,000
Mephis City Council Memphic City Economic Development Strategy The project will develop a suite planning documents towards economic growth of Memphis. Gracelands $50,000

CSS styles

Desktop

Table
table {
    background-color: transparent;
    border-top: 4px solid #DDE2E6;
}
Header cells
th {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 24px;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #DDE2E6;
    padding: 16px;
}
Body cells
td {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 24px;
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #DDE2E6;
    padding: 16px;
}

Mobile

Table
table {
    background-color: transparent;
    border-top: 4px solid #DDE2E6;
}
Header cells - closed row
th {
    color: #33333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 22px;
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #DDE2E6;
    padding: 16px;
}
Header cells - open row
th {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 22px;
    background-color: #EBEBEB;
    border-bottom: none;
    padding: 16px;
}
Body cells - open row
th {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 22px;
    background-color: #EBEBEB;
    border-bottom: none;
    padding: 16px;
}
Chevron icon
.icon {
    color: #333333;
    width: 16px;
    height: 10px;
}

Guidelines for use.

Purpose:

Tables display information in an easy to scan grid of rows and columns.  

When to use this component:

  • To help users look for patterns and insights between comparable content.
  • To present lists of content with the same headings (e.g. grant recipient details). 

Layouts

Page layouts

Tables should only be used in two-third width pages. Large tables can be displayed at full width on pages that do not contain the side menu.

Component layout options

Full width layout

Desktop, Tablet & Mobile: One component in a row.
